recipe_name: Green bean salad with Stilton croûton
author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the oil and vinegar into a small bowl, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and whisk together. Place the green beans into a large bowl, pour over the dressing and stir. To serve, spread the Stilton over the toasted ciabatta and place on top of the salad.
ingredients: 2 tsp olive oil,  1 tsp balsamic vinegar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  150g/5½oz green beans, topped and tailed, blanched,  1 slice ciabatta, toasted,  30g/1oz Stilton
